reviewText:
... and I've never forgotten it.  I want it and (like "Pass The Ammo" with Tim Curry) it's impossible to find on DVD or BluRay.
This movie (of the three, it's the only one I've seen) is hilarious!  A spoof of the Nick Carter style action stuff meets Little Shop of Horrors.  Believe me, it works.
If you're a fan of absurdist comedy, like Charles Busch, you'll love "Dinner For Adele."
